revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = SparkLAN |model = WL-682 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 15a9 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0E:8E
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3887; |chip2 = Intersil;; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WUBI-116GW |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== A later Class II Permissive Change to MXF-U920917G adds the WUBI-100GW model (marketed as the '''SparkLAN WL-682'''). The device is a net2280-based device in the FCC photos.. but the WL-682 appears to be 3887-based.
==Links of Interest== [http://sparklan.com/download.php?prod_id=141&ranload=1308805942 SparkLAN's drivers], [http://www.movistar.es/on/io/es/atencion/soporte_tecnico_y_averias/internet/adsl/accesorios/adaptadores_USB_inalambricos/USB_g_Ideal/USB_g_Ideal.htm?path=%3Ca%20href%3D%27http%253A%252F%252Fwww.movistar.es%252Fon%252Fio%252Fes%252Fatencion%252Fsoporte_tecnico_y_averias%252Finternet%252Fadsl%252Faccesorios_adsl.htm%27%20class%3D%27texto3_4%27%3EAccesorios%20inal%E1mbricos%20ADSL%20%26gt%3B%20%3C/a%3E Telefonica drivers]
[http://www.zero13wireless.net/foro/showthread.php?191-Poner-antena-externa-a-mi-USB This zero13wireless.net forum thread] appears to have a photo of the board. :The device pictured is a '''Gemtek''' WUBI116GW / WUBI-116GW.
[http://www.zero13wireless.net/foro/showthread.php?1171-Chipset-PRISM working in Win XP with latest drivers as a 3887]
